reviews.review:
I must say that this game is  the best competitive fps shooting game i've ever played but this game also has its Cons for example
 1.  there are too many Hackers unless you have prime.
 2. this game takes patience because you are not gonna get good in couple of weeks you need a lot of determination and
 3. the community is a bit toxic but if you are having troubles of toxic teammates just mute them because they might put you off of your game

But nonetheless the game is very fun with your friends
This Game sucks but im still addicted!

Valve is banning random people on the free2play CSGO. I really dont know what is wrong with your anti cheat, but you ban just people without doing anything. Even though they are new players you banned for example a friend of mine, he played his first player versus player game, instantly got VAC-Banned. Better buy the game to get Prime, otherwise you will get banned without any reason

Do not play this game.  It is slow, it is clunky, it is boring, and most of all, the userbase is toxic... really, really toxic.  

If you're wanting to play Counter-Strike, check out Source.  Is way better.
